    • Method Detail

      • FB_CreateExperiment

        public void FB_CreateExperiment(java.lang.String ownerID,
                                java.lang.String experimentName,
                                java.lang.String ownerName,
                                java.lang.String description,
                                java.lang.String region,
                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tags,
                                java.lang.Boolean subscribe,
                                java.lang.Boolean geoEnabled,
                                java.lang.Boolean published,
                                java.lang.String type,
                                java.util.Date date,
                                int minTrials)
        This method creates an Experiment Document in the database that can later be recompiled into one of the Experiment Class's children
        Parameters:
        ownerID - the ID of the user who is creating the experiment
        experimentName - the name of the experiment
        ownerName - the name of the owner of the experiment
        description - a brief description of the experiment
        region - the geolocation of the region
        tags - the tags associated with the experiment
        subscribe - a boolean that tells whether the owner subscribed to the experiment or not
        geoEnabled - a boolean that tells whether or not geolocation is enabled or not
        published - a boolean that tells whether or not the experiment is published or not
        type - the type of experiment(ie: count, nonNegCount, binomial etc)
        date - the date and time of creation of the experiment
        minTrials - the minimum number of trials required to end an experiment

        public void FB_UpdateName(java.lang.String ownerID,
                          java.lang.String name)
        this method updates the name of owner stored in the database by getting the user name o
        Parameters:
        ownerID - id of the user whose name is to be updated
